result.markdown:
## WACC with Debt and Equity Mix ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} set.seed(505) #| eval: true #| results: asis #| echo: false #| warning: false library(webexercises) re <- rnorm(1, mean = 0.12, sd = 0.01) rd <- rnorm(1, mean = 0.06, sd = 0.005) tc <- 0.34 we <- rnorm(1, mean = 0.65, sd = 0.05) wd <- 1 - we ``` ::: Aurora Technologies finances its operations with equity weight **54.8**% (cost of equity = **10.88**%) and debt weight **45.2**% (before-tax cost of debt = **5.36**%). The corporate tax rate is **34**%. ::: {.question-block}
✅ WACC = wₑ·rₑ + w_d·r_d(1−T_c) = **7.56**%.
:::
